children.name: Peleg
children.note: in his days the earth was divided

children.name: Er
children.mother: the daughter of Shua, the Canaanitess
children.note: Firstborn. Wicked in the sight of the Lord. God killed him.

children.name: Onan
children.mother: the daughter of Shua, the Canaanitess

children.name: Shelah
children.mother: the daughter of Shua, the Canaanitess

children.name: Nahshon
children.note: Leader of the children of Judah

children.name: Segub
children.mother: the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead
children.note: Hezron married her when he was sixty years old

children.name: Jair
children.note: Had 23 cities in the land of Gilead

children.name: Abijah
children.note: After Hezron died, his wife bore Abijah to him

children.name: Mareshah
children.note: This portion was unclear in the text

children.name: Jahdai
children.note: It's not clear is Jahdai is a son or a concubine of Caleb

children.name: Zadbi
children.note: Perhaps Zabdi and Zimri was the same person

children.name: Zimran
children.note: Son born to Keturah, Abraham's concubine

children.name: Jokshan
children.note: Son born to Keturah, Abraham's concubine

children.name: Medan
children.note: Son born to Keturah, Abraham's concubine

children.name: Midian
children.note: Son born to Keturah, Abraham's concubine

children.name: Ishbak
children.note: Son born to Keturah, Abraham's concubine

children.name: Shuah
children.note: Son born to Keturah, Abraham's concubine

children.name: Nimrod
children.note: Began to be a mighty one on the earth

children.name: Casluhim
children.note: from whom came the Philistines and the Caphtorim
